channel.title: Project: RuneScape Remade
channel.description:
Hello everyone, you may have seen my post in the projects sections.
Anyway, Welcome to Project: RuneScape Remade.
As you probably guessed by the title, it's a remake. Now, a lot of you are probably saying, ugh not another remake... and I understand. However, now that Vault switched sources and Rs-Reborn is falling to pieces since sinisoul and scully both quit, the two front runners are gone. I want there at least to be one successful remake, because I really enjoyed the "good old days" of RuneScape and someone needs to re-create them. Hopefully that will be us!
You should consider joining this project if you: Are dedicated and willing to put time and effort in. You have at-least some knowledge of Java. You are passionate about old RuneScape, preferable a RuneScape veteran. You don't mind doing config tasks such as spawns or monster drops.
Currently it's just me working on the project, so you will just be interacting with me.
If you are interested please copy and paste the application forum on the bottom of the page.
Here's my latest Image of the project, if you want to learn more go to my project thread: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,510952.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,510952.0.html[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/T65yz.png[/img]
Name: Age: What experience do you have with Java? What experience do you have related to private servers? If lot's, post some of your work if possible: How much time do you have on your hands? When did you start playing RuneScape? If you could chose, what was your favorite year of RuneScape? What parts of the server do you want work on? Are you willing to invest time and effort and home much time do you have available?

item.title: Project: RuneScape Remade
item.dc:creator: @TechKiid TechKiid
item.description:
@TechKiid wrote:

Name:
Age: 15 years old
What experience do you have with Java? I Handle Java , well
What experience do you have related to private servers? Have a good 5 years experience , i have many Knowledges about Pservers.
If lot’s, post some of your work if possible: Erased , Update some new on youtube.com/Techkiid1337
How much time do you have on your hands? All day!
When did you start playing RuneScape? since 2005
If you could chose, what was your favorite year of RuneScape? 2006-2007
What parts of the server do you want work on? Client , or Server
Are you willing to invest time and effort and home much time do you have available? All day , and i will do as many as i can do.

Thank you

Sincerely , Techkiid

Read full topic

item.title: Project: RuneScape Remade
item.dc:creator: @MarcelScapes MarcelScapes
item.description:
@MarcelScapes wrote:

Rune 2007 never responded to my messages, and sorry mintzero4 but I can’t accept you unless you show me some proof that you actually know how to program. Currently your only posts on this forum are asking how to port-forward, which makes me suspicious.

Thus, we are still looking for server developers!

Read full topic

item.title: Project: RuneScape Remade
item.dc:creator: @mintzero4 mintzero4
item.description:
@mintzero4 wrote:

Name:Hayden
Age:17
What experience do you have with Java? I know a lot about it went to school about it and read up on it
What experience do you have related to private servers? I use to make them and got paid for it.
If lot’s, post some of your work if possible: None that known of sorry
How much time do you have on your hands? About 6 hours a day or more
When did you start playing RuneScape? 6 years ago
If you could chose, what was your favorite year of RuneScape? 2007 when everything was fun
What parts of the server do you want work on? Anything
Are you willing to invest time and effort and home much time do you have available? I have about a estimate 6hours to do some im a very fast paste guy though

Read full topic

As you probably guessed by the title, it’s a remake. Now, a lot of you are probably saying, ugh not another remake… and I understand. However, now that Vault switched sources and Rs-Reborn is falling to pieces since sinisoul and scully both quit, the two front runners are gone.
